metadata.title: CVE-2024-40909 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Fix a potential use-after-free in bpf_link_free()After commit 1a80dbcb2dba, bpf_link can be freed bylink->ops->dealloc_deferred, but the code still tests and useslink->ops->dealloc afterward, which leads to a use-after-free asreported by syzbot. Actually, one of them should be sufficient, sojust call one of them instead of both. Also add a WARN_ON() in caseof any problematic implementation.
